label.p:
If you create a Medium instance (0.04040 EUR/hr) with a 50 GB disk (0.00013 EUR/GB/hr) attached to it
and run Windows (0.01010 EUR/hr) on it for 24 hours, how much will you pay?

choiceresponse.description: Please select all applicable options from the list below. Multiple selections are allowed.

checkboxgroup.choice: 24 x 0.04040 = 0.97 EUR ... you only need to pay for the machine.
24 x 0.04040 + 24 x 50 x 0.00013 = 1.13 EUR ... you pay for the machine and storage.
24 x 0.04040 + 24 x 50 x 0.00013 + 24 x 0.01010 = 1.24 EUR ... you pay for the machine, storage and license.

div.p: Have a look at answer 3, 3 like 3 parts to consider ...

demandhint.hint: If your calculation formular does not consist of 3 parts ... it might be wrong ;)
